alert.note: Alert for Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 11:44AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A cluster of gusty showers and a strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Onondaga County through 1245 PM EDT... At 1142 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and a strong thunderstorm over Niles, or 10 miles southeast of Auburn, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, De Witt, Pompey, Solvay, Manlius, Fayetteville, Owasco, Minoa and East Syracuse. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 34A and 35. New York Interstate 81 between 15 and 22, and near 23, 24A and B. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If on or near Owasco, Skaneateles, or Otisco lakes get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
